directions: In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin, dry pudding mix, dry milk powder and water. Blend in 1/4 cup whipped topping and pumpkin pie spice.
Pour filling into pie crust, top with remaining whipped topping, sprinkle with pecans and toffee chips. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free butterscotch pudding mix
title: Pumpkin Toffee Cream Pie
